name: hohlenvolk-tunnel-crossroads
prompt: Fantasy concept art: an underground tunnel intersection where multiple passages converge. At the junction, bone markers are embedded in the walls — skulls and femurs of beast-folk ancestors serving as directional waypoints. Bioluminescent fungi cast blue-violet light across smooth limestone walls. A lone beast-folk trader stands at the crossroads consulting a mental map, fur visible under layered silk robes. Narrow passages lead in five directions, each with a different ambient color: amber (toward volcano), blue (toward coast), green (toward hinterland), violet (deeper underground), grey (toward fortress). Atmospheric, mysterious, functional. Painted concept art style.
negative_prompt: dungeon, monsters, combat, bright, anime, cartoon, text, watermark, steampunk

name: schwellstelle-volcanic-vein
prompt: Fantasy concept art: a geological anomaly deep underground where organic material breaks through volcanic rock. Thick vein-like structures of amber-orange biological matter pulse faintly between layers of dark basalt. The veins branch like blood vessels, some as thick as tree trunks, others hair-thin. A figure in volcanic clan robes kneels beside the exposed vein, carefully extracting material with bone tools. The surrounding rock shows layers of geological history. Bioluminescent moss grows where the organic material meets air. The mood is reverent and slightly unsettling — this looks alive. Dark atmosphere, warm amber and cool blue contrast. Painted concept art style.
negative_prompt: bright, cheerful, anime, cartoon, text, watermark, steampunk, modern, sci-fi

name: festung-scherben-quarter-life
prompt: Fantasy concept art: daily life in the Scherben quarter — the unofficial slum in the outer ring of a massive medieval fortress. Makeshift shelters lean against towering fortress walls. A shared cooking fire where people from different races gather — humans, beast-folk, even a volcanic clan member. Children play with a handmade ball. A woman mends clothing made from mismatched fabrics of all factions. Laundry lines cross between structures. Despite poverty, there is community and resilience. Warm firelight against cold stone walls. Overcast sky visible above. NOT apocalyptic — this is poverty with dignity. Painted concept art style.
negative_prompt: zombie, apocalyptic, destroyed, anime, cartoon, text, watermark, steampunk, bright cheerful

name: nornen-three-sisters-coast
prompt: Fantasy character concept art: three elderly women at the coast, each in a different pose representing past, present, and future. The first reads from a stone tablet, hunched over ancient text. The second spins thread from raw wool, sitting upright and alert. The third holds shears, standing and looking out to sea. They wear layered coastal scholar robes in different states — pristine, worn, and threadbare. Behind them, a ruined lighthouse in morning fog. The sea is grey-green and restless. Germanic mythology atmosphere — these are the Norns at the well of Urd, reimagined as medieval coastal scholars. Muted palette, atmospheric. Painted concept art style.
negative_prompt: young, beautiful, magic, glowing, anime, cartoon, text, watermark, steampunk, bright

name: festung-kern-sealed-door
prompt: Dark fantasy concept art: a massive sealed door deep inside a fortress. The door is made of Grundstein — black stone smoother than obsidian, harder than anything known. No visible hinges, no lock, no handle. The surface has faint organic vein-like patterns that seem to shift in torchlight. Guards stand at a respectful distance — they watch the door, not visitors. The surrounding corridor is ancient, the stonework different from the rest of the fortress. Dust motes in torchlight. The mood is sacred and forbidden — whatever is behind this door has been sealed for centuries. No one knows why. Dark atmospheric, warm torchlight against black stone. Painted concept art style.
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, bright, magic portal, glowing runes, text, watermark, steampunk, modern

name: hero-five-factions-confrontation
prompt: Dark fantasy hero shot: a tense standoff between representatives of five factions in a fortress great hall. Center: a lone figure (the Stranger/player) stands between them. To the left: a coastal scholar with astrolabe and a volcanic mystic with basalt jewelry. To the right: a human settler knight and a beast-folk merchant in silk. In the shadows behind: a hooded Innenvolk alchemist with glowing vials. Each faction representative's body language tells a story — the scholar leans forward curious, the knight stands rigid, the merchant calculates, the mystic waits, the alchemist observes. The Stranger faces a choice. Dramatic torchlight, painted concept art, cinematic composition.
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, bright, friendly, text, watermark, steampunk, modern, magic spells
